content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(2.5, 2.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Electric poles at positions (2.5, 2.5) and (0.5, 1.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (0, 0) and a furnace at position (0, 0)
- Burner mining drill at position (2, 0) and a furnace at position (2, 0)

### Copper cable factory at position(3.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position (3.5, 0.5) and inserter that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup that connects the furnace at position (2, 0) to the assembling machine at position (3.5, 0.5)

### Lab at position(2, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab at position (2, 0) which requires 10 automation science packs to complete Automation research and is currently not powered.

### Storage chest at position(3.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest at position (3.5, 0.5) which currently has no items.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing new electric poles
- Ensure you are using a valid Prototype object when attempting to place new poles. Check the API documentation for correct usage.

### Errors when powering the lab
- Make sure the lab is connected to a power source. Check the positioning of electric poles and ensure they are within range to provide power.

### Errors due to lack of required ingredients
- Ensure you have the necessary ingredients (in this case, 10 automation science packs) in your inventory before attempting to complete research.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the target position.
